mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T_STAFF.id, T_STAFF.* FROM ( T_STAFF INNER JOIN T_STAFF_SCHEDULE_PLAN ON T_STAFF_SCHEDULE_PLAN.staff_id = T_STAFF.id AND T_STAFF_SCHEDULE_PLAN.work_date = #{date} ) INNER JOIN ( SELECT MIN(T_CAREWORK.end_date) AS min_date, T_CAREWORK.carer_id AS carer_id FROM T_CAREWORK WHERE CONVERT(nvarchar(23), T_CAREWORK.end_date, 120) >= '2015-03-24' AND T_CAREWORK.elder_ids LIKE '%,' + CAST(#{id} AS VARCHAR(1000)) + ',%' GROUP BY T_CAREWORK.carer_id ) AS T1 ON T_STAFF.id = T1.carer_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_CAREWORK(carer_id, elder_ids, gero_id, end_date, status) VALUES (#{carerId}, #{elderIds}, #{geroId}, #{endDate}, #{status})
